title: Bug 49536: No content in response when accessing URL with no webapps deployed
OB: When starting a Tomcat 7 instance without deploying any webapps and accessing a URL, the response returns an HTTP code of 200 OK with no content instead of the expected HTTP error 404.
EB: The expected behavior is for the response to return an HTTP error 404 when accessing a URL with no webapps deployed.
SR:
To reproduce the issue:
1. Download http://mirror.veriportal.com/apache/tomcat/tomcat7/v7.0.0beta/bin/apachetomcat7.0.0.zip
2. Start a Tomcat 7 instance without deploying any webapps
3. Access a URL in the browser
4. Observe the response code and content
